mapper.insert: INSERT INTO "MEMBER" VALUES(SEQ_MEMBER_NO.NEXTVAL, #{memberEmail}, #{memberPw}, #{memberNickname}, #{memberName}, #{memberRRN}, #{memberTel}, #{memberAddress}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT)
mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_NO FROM "MEMBER" WHERE MEMBER_EMAIL = #{memberEmail} AND SECESSION_FL = 'N'

SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_NICKNAME, MEMBER_NAME, PROFILE_IMAGE, SUBSTR(MEMBER_ADDRESS, 8, 6) MEMBER_ADDRESS, TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY"년" MM"월"') ENROLL_DATE, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REVIEW WHERE REVIEW_FL = 'N' AND MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}) + (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TRAVEL WHERE PRIVATE_FL = 'N' AND MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}) + (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM QUESTION WHERE BLIND_FL = 'N' AND MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}) TOTAL_POSTING, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FOLLOW WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}) TOTAL_FOLLOWER, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FOLLOW WHERE FOLLOW_MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}) TOTAL_FOLLOWING FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}

SELECT M.MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_NICKNAME, MEMBER_NAME, PROFILE_IMAGE, SUBSTR(MEMBER_ADDRESS, 8, 6) MEMBER_ADDRESS, TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY"년" MM"월"') REVIEW_DATE, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REVIEW WHERE REVIEW_FL = 'N' AND MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO) + (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TRAVEL WHERE PRIVATE_FL = 'N' AND MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO) + (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM QUESTION WHERE BLIND_FL = 'N' AND MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO) TOTAL_POSTING, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FOLLOW WHERE MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO) TOTAL_FOLLOWER, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FOLLOW WHERE FOLLOW_MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO) TOTAL_FOLLOWING FROM FOLLOW F JOIN "MEMBER" M ON (F.FOLLOW_MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO) WHERE F.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
